item.title: Blog Init
item.description: It works! You can learn a little bit about me, first. The Mission The year is 2020. There’s this virus going around, but that’s a story for another blog. We’ve all got a little extra time on our hands, so I want to dig into what it is I want to be able to build, acknowledge the skills I do have, fill in the gaps I don’t, and ship (which in this case would simply mean calling it done-ish).
